summary: An ancient King who in search for immortality and power made evil pacts with several daedric princes.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://s1.postimg.org/fe21o1p3z/banner.jpg[/img]

[font=Georgia][center]
An ancient King who in his search for immortality and power made evil pacts with several daedric princes.
When they found out of his treachery, he was damned for it, with his entire army.[/center][/font]

[font=Georgia]
Recommended for high level characters [lvl 60+ players].

[i][color=#980000][size=3][b]FEATURES[/b][/size][/color][/i]
- You will face very dark, misty and gloomy hallways.
- Lots of enemies.
- Hard battles.
- Replayability. (uses default respawn rates)

[i][b][color=#980000][size=3]COMPATIBILITY[/size][/color][/b][/i]
Compatible with any mod that do not change or modify the same cell where the entrance of this mod is placed.

[i][color=#980000][size=3][b]INSTALLATION[/b][/size][/color][/i]
Put the .esp in the data folder.
Check the esp with your SkyrimLauncher.

[b][i][color=#980000][size=3]REQUIREMENTS[/size]
[/color][/i][/b]- Skyrim Version 1.9.32.0.8+
- Dawnguard



[b][color=#980000][size=3][i]ChangeLog:[/i][/size][/color][/b]
1.00     initial release
1.02     Cleaned with Tes5Edit
1.10     Updated Final Battle
1.1.02  fixed bug that prevent followers to zone in into the dungeon

[b][i][color=#980000][size=3]Credits:[/size][/color][/i][/b]
Bethesda for such an amazing game.[/font]
author: ebene
